quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: An unhurried sense of time is in itself a form of wealth.
quotes.author: Bonnie Friedman

quotes.quote: Prefer loss to the wealth of dishonest gain; the former vexes you for a time; the latter will bring you lasting remorse.
quotes.author: Chilo

quotes.quote: Maybe it would be better to acknowledge, like the Greeks, that a lot of behavior we call addiction is really a love of pleasure that carries the force of habit. We become addicted mostly because of the central issue in all self-control problems, which is the disproportionate value we place on short-term rewards.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Anyone may have diamonds: an heirloom is an ornament of quite a different kind.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It is pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Though I am grateful for the blessings of wealth, it hasn't changed who I am. My feet are still on the ground. I'm just wearing better shoes.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Wealth is the parent of luxury and indolence, and poverty of meanness and viciousness, and both of discontent.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Nothing is more admirable than the fortitude with which millionaires tolerate the disadvantages of their wealth.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is the sign of a weak mind to be unable to bear wealth.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Wealth is the slave of a wise man. The master of a fool.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Be charitable before wealth makes thee covetous.
